subject: NHAI to review the progress of the Project \"Two laning with paved shoulders of Nagapattinam Thanjavur Section of NH-7 in the state of Tamil Nadu\"
text: IRay 7eq THf nfeqro 774 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ec Wart a (otnf TTTTT) Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3i-5 & 6, 10 , &Ra, # farl-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11014/11/2016-HR-| Dated: 02.01.2017 Policy Circular: (16.7/2016) (Decision taken on File NoNHAI/BOT/11012/48/2005/NT) the meeting held on 08.12.2016 under the Chairmanship of Chairman, NHAI to review the progress of the project "Two with Paved Shoulders of Nagapattinam Thanjavur Section of NH-67 in the State of Tamil Nadu", being executed by M/s Madhucon Projects Ltd, it was observed that the progress of work is very slow. 2_ Certain commitments were made by the Contractor the meeting: at the poor performance of the Contractor, it has been decided that M/s Madhucon Projects Ltd shall not be considered for award of any project in NHAI till achieve the committed targets. 3 The above aspect is brought to the notice of all the Technical Divisions, NHAI for kind information and taking cognizance of the same. (Ram Askaylengi To: General Manager (Coord) All officers and employees of HQ/ROsIPIUs/CMUs/Site Offices HMMM tn / WHAL Hzr - During laning during Looking they
